## Functions

### emitComments() {#a0e50dc982f01eab3eeb5eef624e25f03}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void emitComments (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmdisasmcontext">LLVMDisasmContext</a> &#42; DC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; FormattedOS)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Emits the comments that are stored in <code>DC</code> comment stream.

Each comment in the comment stream must end with a newline.

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Emits latency information in DC-&gt;CommentStream for \\p Inst, based</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  DC-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmdisasmcontext/#a26ae4b99e4c6cd8620f8603354572a33">CommentStream</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Latency: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LLVMDisasmInstruction() disassembles a single instruction using the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// disassembler context specified in the parameter DC.  The bytes of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction are specified in the parameter Bytes, and contains at least</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BytesSize number of bytes.  The instruction is at the address specified by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the PC parameter.  If a valid instruction can be disassembled its string is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// returned indirectly in OutString which whos size is specified in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// parameter OutStringSize.  This function returns the number of bytes in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction or zero if there was no valid instruction.  If this function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// returns zero the caller will have to pick how many bytes they want to step</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// over by printing a .byte, .long etc. to continue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#ga4ab4dad1fdcb9e651fa60f6059ab09b4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#ga4ab4dad1fdcb9e651fa60f6059ab09b4">LLVMDisasmInstruction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcdisassembler/#gae903996143e88ff186c738f81122094e">LLVMDisasmContextRef</a> DCR, uint8&#95;t &#42;Bytes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">                             uint64&#95;t BytesSize, uint64&#95;t PC, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;OutString,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OutStringSize)&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
